messages.subject: thanks Julie :)
messages.msgSnippet: thanks Julie, it s nice of you to remember me ... I ve been keeping up w/ all the posts but I ve been SUPER BUSY getting ready for our 1st grandbaby (NO, I m
messages.messageBody:
thanks Julie, it's nice of you to remember me ...

I've been keeping up w/ all the posts but I've been SUPER BUSY getting ready
for our 1st grandbaby (NO, I'm NOT THAT OLD, ha, @ least I keep telling
myself that, ha) ... dd will be induced on Sept 14th if she doesn't have the
baby sooner ... by that date, she'll be 41 wks and her dr wants to get
things rolling (which I'm NOT happy about but whattdoIknowI'mjustGramby!!!)
... bless her heart, my poor dd is just MISERABLE in the Dallas heat (109*
yesterday!!!) BLAH :P

dh, dss and I will be present @ the *big event* and I'm SO EXCITED!!!
wellllll, let me rephrase that statement, my fellas won't actually be *w/*
dd but Gramby WILL, I can't wait!!! she started to have home birth but
complications won't allow; I keep telling her the goal is healthy
baby/mommie ... dh will be on vacation from mid-Sept-mid-Oct, so we'll be
free to enjoy the next few wks *playing* w/ little Kinsey Mc Lane or Samuel
Alexander <VBG> ... I'll have more time to participate when we return and
life gets back to *normal*, whatever that means, lol :)

Pris ~> WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently
my cats have learned how to type ...



----- Original Message -----
From: <Jaam1224@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 02, 2000 1:34 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pris....corporal punishment ...


>
> Pris,
> I have been wondering where you have been.....we haven't heard from you as
of
> late......I thought maybe you had taken sometime off : )
>
> Julie
